Data.encode: Encode data via an encoding algorithm.
Data.decode: Decode data via an encoding algorithm.
Data.hmac: Use HMAC hashing with a given algorithm, key, and data.
Data.brute: Bruteforce an MD5, SHA256, or SHA512 hash, uses rockyou.

Administrative.kick: Kick a specified user with an optional reason.
Administrative.ban: Ban a specified user with an optional reason.
Administrative.shred: Deletes the amount of messages specified, already includes yours.

Fun.random_choice: Get Multi-Bot to make a random selection based on values separated by dashes.
Fun.cute_check: Check the cuteness level of a specified user.
Fun.urandom: Receive a urandom-generated number based on supplied bytes.
Fun.mct: Measurements of Central Tendency (Mean, Median, and Mode) on values specified. Separate values with dashes.
Fun.user_count: Gets the users of the server.
Fun.roles: Gets the roles of the current guild.
Fun.avatar: Gets the avatar of a specified user, if none, then it'll grab yours.
Fun.change_nick: Change a users nickname, requires valid perms to do so.
Fun.dm_member: DM a specified member, message will be sent by Multi-Bot.

Games.roll: Roll a dice with a bet, if your bet is 1 higher, lower, or is equal to the roll, you win.
Games.points: Check how many Vyrix points you, or a specified member has.
Games.give_points: Transfer some points to a specified user.

Misc.guilds: Get how many guilds Vyrix belongs to.
Misc.roo: Get invite to Vyrix's best friend's bot.
Misc.synonyms: Get the synonyms for a word.
Misc.ip_lookup: Get IP information via ipinfo.io's API.
Misc.post: Get a post from e621.net. NSFW images are only allowed in NSFW marked channels.
Misc.md5_to_post: Get an e621 post ID based on its MD5sum.
Misc.req_key: Request the owners PGP encryption key. Will be sent in DM.
Misc.gen_passwd: Allows Multi-Bot to generate a safe password based on the length specified. (No extended ASCII!).
Misc.fetch: Fetch an image from wallhaven.cc, only `Neko` allowed
Misc.salt: Generate a bcrypt-style salt via given rounds. Defaults to 12.
Misc.identify: Identify a given hash. (Finds algorithm. MD5, SHA256, etc..)

Fernet.encrypt: Encrypt a string using your Fernet key.
Fernet.decrypt: Decrypt Fernet encrypted string using your Fernet key.
Fernet.my_key: Request your Fernet key, sends in DM.
Fernet.disable_multikey: Disable multifernet keys (Automatically sends new single key in DM).
Fernet.list_keys: List the *imported* keys attached to your account, and the IDs.
Fernet.clear_keys: Clear your list of imported keys.
Fernet.encrypt_with: Encrypt with an imported key. Syntax: ./encrypt_with <key_id> <message>.
Fernet.decrypt_with: Decrypt with an imported key. Syntax: ./decrypt_with <key_id> <message>.
Fernet.key_override: Override the amount of keys in your MultiFernet rotation.
Fernet.gen_shared: Generate new key specifically for sharing (recommended.).
Fernet.rotation: Check how many fernet keys you have in your MultiFernet rotation.
